title: Rainforests
description: Rainforests are among Earth's most precious resources. Home to an astonishing number of plant and animal species, rainforests are abundant in both their life-giving powers and beauty. Rainforests provides students with a detailed look at the intricacies of both tropical and temperate rainforests. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify main ideas and details as well as identify and use closed-compound words.
meta: abundant, adaptation, camouflage, canopy, decomposition, dense, diversity, evaporates, humid, nutrients, temperate, tropical
